text:
@fordnation The number of new reported #COVID19 cases (per million) in #Ontario are have risen for the last few days, while the number of reported cases (per million) in #Canada has plateaued. Should these trends inform how Ontario #ReOpen the #economy?

More here: https://t.co/9PAc2eQsQH
